Name: The Sword That Kills Christmas
About the game: The Sword That Kills Christmas is a text based, bullet hell choose your own adventure game that takes you on a journey through the North pole, France and Santa Monica. On this journey your choices dictate everything. You might end up poisoning one of Santa's reindeers or trying to find your mom (you're an orphan) or something entirely different. Where will your path lead?
